Dear Faisal,

 

We acknowledge receipt of your below email and its content safely. Kindly provide us the supporting documents as per the terms and condition of the policy;

3.	Saudi Customs Short landing certificate;  
4.	Stevedores and port damage report;
5.	Claim form duly completed in all respects (attached).

 

Best
